ygData.subject: Re: Interesting bug
ygData.msgSnippet: this also happens in Blackborrow at zone to qeynos hills, if ye get hit while zoning ye get knocked into a right hand of the zone cave that no gnolls will
ygData.messageBody:
this also happens in Blackborrow at zone to qeynos hills, if ye get hit
while zoning ye get knocked into a right hand of the zone cave that no
gnolls will follow you into, also in EC on the wall with the neculos
zone<sp?> if ye run too high ye can run off the world and get sent to a safe
point near the freeport zone line .....bout 20 feet up
Pinen
Hopeless Bard of the Rathe
Master Brewer of the NwN(pre-patch)
Bard of the 17th Song

----- Original Message -----
From: Kimes, Dean W. <Dean_Kimes@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, September 01, 1999 1:33 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Interesting bug


> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
> Good thing they remembered to seal that cave off or you would have run
> 'behind the world' like I did in Butcherblock.
